NewTestCases.TestCaseName: Validate Repository Visibility Setting During and After Creation
Steps: Navigate to the repository creation page.
Verify that the repository is created as Public.
Navigate to repository settings and confirm visibility is set to Public.
Repeat steps 1-6 with 'Private' as repository visibility and confirm repository is Private.
ExpectedResults: Repository is created with the selected visibility (Public/Private).
Repository settings post-creation reflect the selected visibility option.
